title: American_Top_40_1981_July 4th_Beatles_Special
description:
American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This is a reissue of a torrented file I previously downloaded.

In this broadcast Casey counts down the top 40 hits of the Beatles, together as a group and as individuals. I added five extras.

One song in the countdown contains the lyrics, "FrÃƒÂ¨re Jacques" and there is one song in the countdown not written by the Beatles.

One song in the countdown received an Oscar nomination and another got the Beatles sued by Chuck Berry.

One song in the countdown is the only number one in chart history to have the same song on both sides!

One song in the countdown has a drummer that isn't Ringo, and another song by Ringo is the only number one song ever to feature a kazoo!
